short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Overcome impulse shopping with Habitâ€™s Checkout Snooze! Save carts for later so you only buy what you want (and feel good about it).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How often do you buy something online and then regret it later? We all have those "regretsy" moments. 

Millions of dollars have been spent by marketers trying to get your emotional brain to pay for things before your rational brain can catch up. One-click checkout, saving payment information, all developed to get you to buy now, think later.

So how do you combat this? Simple. You use the same psychology tricks they use.

Habit Money's Checkout Snooze combats impulse spending by forcing you to pause before you buy something. That simple pause gives your rational brain a chance to catch up.

You might still make the purchase, but you will do so intentionally.

Every time you go to a checkout page, the Checkout Snooze will pop up and ask you if you want to sleep on it, or continue.

If you continue, the pop-up will disappear and you can continue with your purchase.

If you snooze, your checkout will be saved in the Habit Money extension. You can click on it and see your saved checkouts and get back to them anytime. We'll save them for 2 weeks for you.

Use the Checkout Snooze to save money, spend intentionally, and feel in control of your money!
